body_html:
My bad, I forgot to precise I installed caffe2-gcc4.8 (just edited the original question).
On the non working system, ldd gives

./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.18' not found (required by ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so)
./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.14' not found (required by ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so)
./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `CXXABI_1.3.5' not found (required by ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so)
./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.19' not found (required by ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so)
./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: /lib64/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.14' not found (required by ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so)
	linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00002aaaaaaab000)
	libcaffe2.so => not found
	libpthread.so.0 => /lib64/libpthread.so.0 (0x00002aaaaada3000)
	libglog.so.0 => not found
	libstdc++.so.6 => /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6 (0x00002aaaaafc0000)
	libm.so.6 => /lib64/libm.so.6 (0x00002aaaab2c7000)
	libgcc_s.so.1 => /lib64/libgcc_s.so.1 (0x00002aaaab54b000)
	libc.so.6 => /lib64/libc.so.6 (0x00002aaaab761000)
	/lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x0000003c5b200000)

When normal caffe2 is installed (on another linux system), I get

libstdc++.so.6 => /home/louis/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/caffe2/python/./../../../../libstdc++.so.6 (0x00007fb8cdf64000)

My bad, I forgot to precise I installed caffe2-gcc4.8 (just edited the original question).
On the non working system, ldd gives
./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.18' not found (required by ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so)

./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.19' not found (required by ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so)
./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: /lib64/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.14' not found (required by ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so)

body:
My bad, I forgot to precise I installed `caffe2-gcc4.8` (just edited the original question).
On the non working system, ldd gives

    ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.18' not found (required by ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so)
    ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.14' not found (required by ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so)
    ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `CXXABI_1.3.5' not found (required by ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so)
    ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.19' not found (required by ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so)
    ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: /lib64/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.14' not found (required by ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so)
    	linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00002aaaaaaab000)
    	libcaffe2.so => not found
    	libpthread.so.0 => /lib64/libpthread.so.0 (0x00002aaaaada3000)
    	libglog.so.0 => not found
    	libstdc++.so.6 => /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6 (0x00002aaaaafc0000)
    	libm.so.6 => /lib64/libm.so.6 (0x00002aaaab2c7000)
    	libgcc_s.so.1 => /lib64/libgcc_s.so.1 (0x00002aaaab54b000)
    	libc.so.6 => /lib64/libc.so.6 (0x00002aaaab761000)
    	/lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x0000003c5b200000)

When normal caffe2 is installed (on another linux system), I get

	libstdc++.so.6 => /home/louis/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/caffe2/python/./../../../../libstdc++.so.6 (0x00007fb8cdf64000)
